pr_title: Feature - REST API to list remote searches

timeline.message:
chore(server): Sort properties of LegacyGuice

There's a lot in there now, so we need to make sure they're easy to browse and add to.
feat(server): Add endpoint to list Remote Searches
refactor(server): Modify Advanced Search endpoint to use new BaseEntitySummary
refactor(oeq-ts-rest-api): Modify Advanced Search function to use new BaseEntitySummary
refactor(autotest): Modify Advanced Search endpoint test to use new BaseEntitySummary
test(autotest): Add test for new Remote Search endpoint

timeline.body: I am a bit surprised that this annotation works. I used to do this for the `search2` test which also extends `AbstractRestApiTest` but it always runs against `rest`.
timeline.bodyText: I am a bit surprised that this annotation works. I used to do this for the search2 test which also extends AbstractRestApiTest but it always runs against rest.
timeline.bodyHTML: I am a bit surprised that this annotation works. I used to do this for the search2 test which also extends AbstractRestApiTest but it always runs against rest.
timeline.author: PenghaiZhang
